text: Ani jya lokanna allahane apalya krpene dhanavana kele ahe ani te tarihi kanjusi karatata tara tyala tyanni cangale samaju naye, ulata te tyancya hakkata atisaya va'ita ahe. Tyanni jya (dhana-sampatti) ta kanjusi keli ahe, kayamatacya divasi tyancya galyatale jokhanda (tauka) banela, ani akasanca va jaminica varasa kevala allaha ahe ani to tumacya sarva karmanci khabara rakhato
